panels.description: Rate of the eBPF map operations (top $query_top_N by pod, map, operation, status)

targets.expr: topk($query_top_N ,sum(rate(mermin_ebpf_map_ops_total{map="$ebpf_map", status="ok"}[$__rate_interval])) by ($group_by_pod_label, map, operation, status))
topk($query_top_N ,sum(rate(mermin_ebpf_map_ops_total{map="$ebpf_map", status="not_found"}[$__rate_interval])) by ($group_by_pod_label, map, operation, status))
topk($query_top_N ,sum(rate(mermin_ebpf_map_ops_total{map="$ebpf_map", status="error"}[$__rate_interval])) by ($group_by_pod_label, map, operation, status)) * -1

panels.title: eBPF map ops (top $query_top_N)

panels.title: eBPF map bytes (top $query_top_N)
